author: cheryl

review: I absolutly love the Fir TV Stick!!!I got the Fire TV Stick through the Sling TV deal and it is awesome. The stick is very fast and has a lot of content that I want to watch through my Amazon Prime account. Best of all I am a cord cutter and now you can use the Sling app on the Fire TV Stick to watch cable TV channels.For $20 bucks I get most of the stations that I have been missing and they are adding more stations every month. The Fire TV Stick also streams all of my favorite app such as Pandora and I Heart Radio. Everything works awesome.There is one bad point in my honest opinion with the Fire TV Stick and it is the remote. Feels bad in my hand. I find my self pushing the enter button accidentally while navigating the menus when all I wanted to do was to move up or down. In my opinion the little ring around the outside of the enter button is by far to thin. It needs to be a bit larger to keep the accidental button pushes down.Other than that I love the device! I think it is a perfect complement to my Apple TV. I get everything I want between the two devices.
